job_description:
Welcome to Find Your Fun, a Wizards of the Coast Studio. Our aim is to entertain and educate children through the power of play. We are a team of game designers, artists, educators, developers, product managers, and more building a portfolio of apps, including the popular preschool app World of Peppa Pig. Do you want to come and build beloved kids' apps with us?

We are seeking a versatile and experienced Senior Software Development Engineer to join our growing team at our studio in Toronto, Canada.

What You'll Do

Develop features and gameplay functionality in Unity and C#
Prototype new game ideas.
Work with the Product Manager to design features with our customers' experience in mind.
Consistently write best-in-class code that anticipates scaling concerns.
Deconstruct large, complicated systems into well-defined tasks with clear dependencies and estimates.
Identify and correct performance problems in large and complicated systems.
Find elegant solutions to complicated problems and translate those solutions into a clear series of actions.
Anticipate architectural problems and develop mitigation plans to address them.
Mentor and guide team members to improve quality, efficiency, and effectiveness.

What You'll Bring

B.Sc. in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent education / work experience.
5+ years of commercial game or mobile app development experience.
3+ years of development experience with Unity or Unreal Engine.
Strong programming skills with C#
Good understanding of mobile platforms and hardware.
Experience with debugging, profiling, and performance optimizations.
Experience with git.
Ability to work effectively with diverse groups of people.
